name: Rhyperior
flavorText:
It puts rocks in holes in its palms
and uses its muscles to shoot them.
GEODUDE are shot at rare times.

previous.name: Lickilicky
previous.flavorText:
It wraps things with its extensible
tongue. Getting too close to it
will leave you soaked with drool.

next.name: Tangrowth
next.flavorText:
It ensnares prey by extending
arms made of vines. Losing arms to
predators does not trouble it.

pokemon.name: Rhyhorn
pokemon.flavorText:
A POKéMON with a
one-track mind.
Once it charges,  it won't stop
running until it
falls asleep.

pokemon.name: Rhydon
pokemon.flavorText:
Protected by an
armor-like hide,
it is capable of living in molten
lava of 3,600
degrees.

pokemon.name: Rhyperior
pokemon.flavorText:
It puts rocks in holes in its palms
and uses its muscles to shoot them.
GEODUDE are shot at rare times.
